There shouldn't be much restriction for parent's visit

1. It is not very nice on how students are restricted on how many times they are allowed to go home per semester given which such permissions are solely approved by the parents, so why restrict it to only twice or thrice a semester even when parents are okay with them coming home, even during an emergency they have to highly depend and go through so many process to go home especially it’s very frustrating during times when they have to attend funerals or visit hospitals. And getting these permissions approved is time consuming as to how they have to submit letters and get it signed like 3 days prior, due to this tedious process they can’t even make last minute plans though they have enough permissions to go home. 

2. Girls are not allowed to step outside the campus no matter what, so what’s the harm in roaming in campus atleast till 7 or 7:30, to use library and have dinner in KC. 

3. Most of the times it has been a hassle to even meet the parents, again the procedure the signatures the letters to be given to meet their own parents.

4. Girls are not allowed to step outside the campus, they don’t have Swiggy or Zomato food services to eat what they prefer whenever they want, or to buy any essentials , they’ll always have to depend on parents or dayscholars to get what we want, and it’s very sad how they are allowed only once a month to go out and enjoy the outside world and eat and buy stuffs they like, given that they have sooo many restrictions within the college like the curfew timing and inability to step outside the campus, it’ll be really great if they are atleast allowed to go outside the campus on weekends and return within the curfew time, why should it be only once in a month, they feel that they can be allowed to enjoy weekends. Sometimes the parents might even be here in local, they might want to go meet them, again they have to depend on this single Sunday permission or they have to burden their parents to come take them out from the hostel after all the procedures. Girls can be allowed to go out during weekends and holidays and return within the curfew time, they would love to go out for shopping have good food and visit their parents and relatives as well, these things shouldn’t be this hard to get access to.
